--- Switchblade ---

Switchblade looks up from his thoughts, his eyes widdening, 
"Whoa, Big M, what're ya doin to tha console?!" He exclaims. "I 
don't think Megs'll be too happy." He walks over and jumps up onto 
the console in front of Motormaster, "What is so important that it 
caused you to destroy the console for no apparent reason?" He 
pokes Motormaster in the chest, looking eye level at the big bot.
